description:
You are on a hard packed gravel path. To the west is the Eastern
entrance to Whitestone Keep. Massive iron bound timbers are fastened
together to form the forbidding doors to the inner city. The city walls
themselves are easily twenty feet tall. White granite blocks with veins of
shimmering minerals, the massive wall runs both north and south from here.
To the west you can see the towering peaks of the Castle of Whitestone
Keep reaching towards the sky.
name: Before the gates
